item.description:
We will be discussing Harriet Beecher Stowe’s “Uncle Tom’s Cabin” from 3:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. on Saturday, February 25 at 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden. Dan Blinn has arranged a private group tour of the Harriet Beecher Stowe Center for the morning of the same day.

The cost will be $8 per person, pay at the door. The Stowe Center is located at 77 Forest Street in Hartford, CT, right next door to the Mark Twain house on Forest Street.

We need to get an approximate head-count to the Center, so please let Dan Blinn know ASAP if you are planning to attend.

For updates and to sign up for our e-mail list, go to www.cthumanist.org
item.name: Private group tour of the Harriet Beecher Stowe Center
